verbs.description: For several weeks there [V: has] been a tug of war ( literally ) between North Korea 's Kim Jong Un and Moscow 's Donald Trump . The President has demonstrated severe inconsistency on the subject of whether he would meet with Kim . The announcements and reversals ...
